title: Groove3 FabFilter Mixing and Mastering Plug-Ins Explained TUTORi
description:
Groove3 FabFilter Mixing and Mastering Plug-Ins Explained






FABULOUS TOOLS FOR AUDIO

FabFilter makes the best possible tools for music production and audio processing, and Groove3 makes the best videos for FabFilter plug-ins! Follow along as studio guru Mark Struthers takes you through the FabFilter Mixing and Mastering plug-in suite, step by step, with excellent audio examples so you hear what they all can do.

Mark begins with an introduction covering what you'll learn in the series and more. Next, Mark jumps right in, dissecting the amazing Pro-DS De-Esser plug-in, followed by the powerful Pro-C Compressor plug-in. You'll learn what all the features and functions do, as well as hear them in-action on Vocals, Snare Drum, Master Bus and more. Expert Mode is also shown, and Mark demonstrates how to do Parallel Compression and Mid-Side Processing to give you complete coverage of this powerful plug-in.

Continuing on, Mark serves up the Pro-G Gate / Expander plug-in, explaining all of its knobs and buttons, and gives examples on removing 'dead air' from your tracks, mic spill on a snare drum track and more. Pro-L is up next, and Mark demystifies this powerhouse Limiting plug-in, enlightening you as he goes. Learn all of its parameters, modes and metering options, and hear it do its thing on a Submix, creating a huge sound with plenty of punch.

Mark saves the best for last, showing you the incredible Pro-Q Equalizer and Pro-MB Multiband / Expander plug-ins inside and out. See and hear them work on audio while Mark explains all of their controls in detail, as well as how to use them to sculpt your sound both surgically and or with broad strokes. You'll even get useful shortcuts for working with these plug-ins that will save you time and boost creativeness.

If you mix or master music, why not sound fabulous? Learn how to get the most from these truly amazing sounding plug-ins, watch "FabFilter Mixing & Mastering Plug-Ins Explained" today...





Product Highlights

22 tutorials / 2hrs 26min total runtime
For all beginner to intermediate FabFilter plug-in users.
Tutorials written by DAW expert Mark Struthers
